Title: Ghajini
Writer: Piyush Mishra (dialogue), A.R. Murugadoss (story and screenplay), Christopher Nolan (based on a screenplay by), Jonathan Nolan (adapted from the short story by)
Actors: Aamir Khan, Asin Thottumkal, Jiah Khan, Pradeep Singh Rawat
Plot: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.
